title: Product Catalog Pricing
description:
Description
For an internal user
who wants to create a new mobile contract on behalf of the customer
the pricing
Is a crucial capability in the sales process,
that finds and presents the correct price for the customer. Various sources and influencing factors are taken into account in order to present the price in an attractive and transparent manner.
Unlike todays solution like BSP or CARMEN
our solution defines or calculates the correct price.
